channel.title: The Throne... Of Lies. Character Sheet Thread
channel.description:
Heya! Please put your character sheet here! Discussion of characters will go to https://discord.gg/gTaVaep or https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-throne-of-lies-interest-check/53491?u=shurian
>All roles must be gone through by one of the hosts of this Roleplay! There are three hosts. @Marluxion @Ami and @Shurian!
>Details of the Castle will be given out as soon as you respond in this thread! The main thread will arise when we have enough Blue Dragons!
**Name:** **Age:** **Gender:** M/F (No attack helicopters.) **Appearance:** **Role:**
------------------------------ Example of a CS
**Name:** Abigail Lindas **Age:** 17 **Gender:** F **Appearance:** ![AsunaLyfe|330x500](upload://bcApPMJbm7vN0sQkZPpsMBvu4MG.jpg) (Yes I know its Asuna now don't go too crazy.) **Personality:**
**Role:** **Psychic**
------------------------ The main thread will be opened shortly! UPDATE: THREAD IS BEING RELEASED. Please add the personality to your character sheets!

Name: Andrew Sorben
Age: 23
Gender: Male
Appearance:

Role: Cult Leader (Former Observer)
Personality: Seemingly nice to everyone , even his cult friends. That’s not all there is to it.
“Hey. Andrew Sorben! Observer and Warden!” Hail Mithras.

This is an example from the Last RP. I’ll be mostly sticking to this format.
Does this confuse you in anyway?

item.title: The Throne... Of Lies. Character Sheet Thread
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
That’s fine, I’m a bad explainer.

Think about this:

If you’re a Sheriff, what would your main objective be?
To find out any members of the rumoured Unseen.

How?

Using your Expert Investigation skills and sending a Scout to spy on certain people to potential sniff out criminal activity, as an example.

Or if you’re the Mastermind, what could potentially be your goal?

To intercept the throne by Converting enough people to your side, while staying In the Shadows to prevent being caught by any Sheriffs. You’d obviously be able to hold your own against attacks, (As the Mastermind can ingame) and would gave good social skills and communication (as he can convert many people ingame).

Does that help?
No?
Probably not.

Read full topic
